explanations: I chose this theta because with the increase in the wolf population, competition for food is rising. By lowering my hunting intensity slightly, I can conserve energy and avoid overexertion while still contributing to the pack's success. This balance helps ensure my survival in a more competitive environment.

I chose this theta because the sheep population is still relatively high compared to the number of wolves, and I need to conserve energy while ensuring I can still hunt effectively. By lowering my intensity slightly, I can avoid competition with other wolves who might be hunting at maximum intensity, allowing me to hunt more efficiently and increase my chances of survival.

I chose this theta because the number of sheep has increased, but the number of wolves has decreased. By lowering my hunting intensity to 0.50, I can conserve energy and avoid competition with other wolves while still taking advantage of the available prey. This balanced approach helps ensure my survival in a changing environment.
vocalizations: Growwwwwl... the hunt is on, but we must be smart!
Growwllllllll... times are tough, but I will adapt!
Grrrrrrr... times are tough, but I will adapt!
